measuretools.color_nonbinary¶

abjad.tools.measuretools.color_nonbinary(expr, color='red')¶

Color all nonbinary mesures in ‘expr’. Useful when giving presentations or explaining transforms.

The usual LilyPond color names are these:

black white red green blue cyan magenta yellow grey darkred darkgreen darkblue darkcyan darkmagenta darkyellow

Additional color names appear in appendix B.5 of the LilyPond LM.

measuretools.binary_to_nonbinary

Next topic
